title: Projects
htmlText:
Frontend design is my cup of tea and I have worked on numerous projects focusing on the structure and organization of consistent HTML, CSS, and presentational Javascript. Whether it is a website redesign and corresponding design system for a Fortune 5 company, a site redesign for a small company in Pittsburgh, or somewhere in between, I am happy to help out.

I work quickly. I work modularly. I work in a way that will help organizations work fast but keep consistency with their brand across the board.

I am fortunate to have worked with some of the best designers and developers in the web design community. Together, we focus on collaborating to create a solid product that can be built upon in the future. Some of these projects are listed below.
